## Query.find() method

Finds list of item from the IndexedDB

**Signature:**

```typescript
find(querySelectors?: IQuerySelectors, options?: IQueryOptions): this;
```

_(Optional)_ Query options


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

this


## Example


```ts
const query = new Query(idb, "store-name");
const data = await query.find({ $query: "text" });
```
